detail_desc: Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Bag in soft imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 14x39x42.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in an airy cotton weave with frill-trimmed smocking at the top and shoulder straps with sewn-on, decorative bows. Unlined.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a glittery appliqué at the front.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. High, adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and narrow hems.
Sports top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Cargo joggers in washed cotton canvas. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and bellows pockets with a flap on the legs. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.
Fitted body in ribbed cotton jersey with a ballerina neckline, short sleeves and lined gusset with press-studs.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a large, draped polo neck, dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
Soft jersey jacket with a button at the front, notch lapels and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Cotton twill linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny, tapered legs.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in patterned chiffon with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist, concealed zip in one side, and straight, wide legs with a high slit at the front. Partly lined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and a yoke with gathers at the back and on the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Metal necklaces in various lengths and designs with plastic and wooden beads. Adjustable length 39-47 cm and 75.5-83 cm.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a double-layered, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Slim Fit.
Jumper in a soft fine cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck. Buttons down the front, long sleeves, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with an opening at the top with a tie detail at the neck and a seam down the front.

Strapless jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a silicone trim at the top, side support and a concealed zip in the side. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie and wide, ankle-length legs. Lined at the top.

Blouse in a airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise and a scalloped hem. V-neck with a wide, scalloped flounce around the neckline and a yoke with scalloped flounces at the back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a scalloped flare at the cuffs.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Calf-length, gently flared skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist, sewn-on tie belt at the front and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Lightweight jersey sports hat. Seamless.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Zip down the front and along one leg, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Kids Exclusive. Shirt in double-weave organic cotton with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in printed cotton jersey with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, chest pocket and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Braided hairband in imitation suede with decorative fabric flowers and elastication at the back.
Wide, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and concealed buttons at the front. Long sleeves, front pockets and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length skirt in satin with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and a slit at the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in mesh made from a cotton blend in a relaxed fit with a yoke at the top, ribbing around the neckline and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Outdoor trousers in slightly stretchy, fast-drying functional fabric with a hook and loop fastening and zip fly and press-stud. Side pockets, a zipped leg pocket, and tapered legs with seams at the knees for optimum comfort and mobility, and reinforced hems.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck and wrapover front. Concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and skirt with box pleats. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in a soft, airy cotton weave with covered elastication at the back of the waist, decorative tabs with a button at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with covered elastication at the sides and decorative tabs and buckles. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Metal hoop earrings in different sizes, three with charms in various designs. Diameter 1-2 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

prod_name: ED Gwen Pu pull on trs
detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in imitation leather. High paper bag waist with wide, covered elastication and a short frill trim at the top. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Partly lined.
Top in softly draping silk with a stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Wide cuffs with concealed buttons, and slits in the sides.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Dress knitted in a cotton blend containing some wool with a pattern knit at the top and long sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with a lace trim at the hem.

Trousers in a sturdy weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Ankle-length, pleated skirt in an airy, patterned weave with a high waist with covered elastication and a wrapover front. Short jersey inner skirt.
Jumpsuit in pleated, patterned jersey with a round neckline and short raglan sleeves. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a drawstring at one side. Lined.
Shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Trousers in woven fabric. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with turn-ups.
Cropped cardigan in a pointelle knit with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. 3/4-length sleeves and narrow smocking and frill trims at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved dress with a sewn-in bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey and a tulle skirt. Bodysuit with a scalloped neckline and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Skirt with shimmering spots and a sewn-on bow.
Shirt in a viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short shorts in soft twill with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has pleats and a sewn-on tie belt at the front. Pockets in the side seams.
T-shirt in printed jersey.
Oversized, straight-cut T-shirt in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and a wrapover, double-layered hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sandals with wide crossover straps and a wide elastic strap at the back. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace yoke.
